That's quite all right, kind of fits in the story actually.  This is Tucsons way of testing Legacy to be sure his loyalties are where he claims they are.


------------------------------
On Mon, May 7, 2012 2:49 PM EDT Super Cyclonus wrote:

>Heh, I was confused as to where Uproar was.
>
>I thought he had stowed away on the ship and so was out with everyone
>else in the jungle, but had just stayed behind on the ship they had
>arrived in.
>
>I went back and read the post, yes you did say he was at the Ark, but
>you had him talking to Straightshot and Straightshot who you had
>posted as coming along on the adventure with everyone else to the
>Jungle. :)
>
>I think in the end he got kind of over looked because of that :)
>
>However I will think of something to post for all of that confusion on
>my part :)
>
>- Preston
>
>
>
>On 5/7/12, Sandy Panico <magicquartz@...> wrote:
>> Tucson looks to Legacy with eyes slightly narrowed.  It was a look of slight
>> annoyance and the fact that Uproar could have been treated long before his
>> symptoms got worse.  Yet he keeps an even demeanor.
>>
>> " Legacy, i would have wanted to know about this sooner...  Uproar's
>> condition has grown worse and so far he has not seen treatment when we
>> obviously have the means to treat him..  Well, that's over now, but I want
>> him treated now, and then you can do the same for me.  I want no delays and
>> no excuses.  Do I make myself clear?"
>>
>> Rattrap nods as he goes to join Windlord.
>>
>> " Right on it boss.  You can count on us.  By the way, be careful around
>> Wings, he's kinda look'n like he's ready ta give someone the business."
>>
>> Quickstride raises his hand.
>>
>> " I got a question.  Legacy says he knows how ta cure Energon Dispersal
>> syndrome.  Howcome he hasn't helped Uproar yet and why hasn't anyone noticed
>> that ?  I mean he's one of us too, we should worry about him."
>>
>> Nightshift nods in agreement.
>>
>> " Yeah what he said, and what about Cheetor, Rhinox and Optimus Primal?  We
>> cant leave until we find them."
>>
>> Local artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and digital
>> media.
>>
>> I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occasion!
>>
>> Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me at this
>> address and we will talk.
